channel.title: Mejin's Open Table
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Mejin's Open Table

item.title: Server Rules
item.description: Be kind and respectful - we are here to have fun. It is ok if the stories take unexpected, or even negative turns At any time feel free to ask others to pause the action to discuss what is going on and clear up emotions.

item.title: Ducky Skysong
item.description: The proprietor of Ducky’s Plush Pies. A male aasimar and a friendly fellow. He has golden hair and grey skin. Seems to have some interesting connections.

item.title: Katla Swordrunner
item.description: Owner of Salty Sky Tavern and Inn in Flusstadt. A female dwarf with long red hair and bronze skin. She is gregarious and sports a tattoo of Imogen the Traveler’s Lantern on her forearm.

item.title: Religions
item.description: While the practices and beliefs vary from group to group, there are many common tenants held across the various groups. Often the various peoples will depict the gods as a member of their species.

item.title: Handy Links
item.description: Here are a handful of helpful links When2Meet.com - A great tool for arranging a time for a session Common item and equipment prices Crafting Rules Basic rules ...

item.title: Orcs
item.description: Pig like in appearance, orcs are often considered both stubborn and loyal. Orcs as a whole are distrustful of magic, believing it lead to the fall of their once great empire, of which there is now only oral tradition.

item.title: Kobolds
item.description: Kobolds are a dragon like people that often make their home in many caves around the region. Like goblins, most kobolds view gold as related to divinity.

item.title: Humans
item.description: The most common people, making up about 50% of the local area. They come from diverse backgrounds and cultures. In the Ausfallen region humans, like many others, are trying to reestablish themselves.

item.title: Halflings
item.description: Halflings of this region are often a bit isolationist, tending to let other people handle big issues and fight wars while they continue to work on and share their books, art, and music ...

item.title: Goblins
item.description: Goblins of this region often view gold as akin to divinity, to be used primarily in worship. Some goblins are happy maintain the gold they already have while others see it as their duty to “reclaim” all gold for their faith.
